title: KORTESTW/KORTESTB/KORTESTQ/KORTESTD — OR Masks And Set Flags

fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`KORTESTW k1, k2`
`KORTESTB k1, k2`
`KORTESTQ k1, k2`
`KORTESTD k1, k2`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Performs a bitwise OR between the vector mask register k2, and the vector mask register k1, and sets CF and ZF based on the operation result.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: ZF flag is set if both sources are 0x0. CF is set if, after the OR operation is done, the operation result is all 1’s.

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
